players.name: Stork
players.profile: Tall, long streak of misery. Loves the bitch slap style golf, but could have other things on his mind - his special lady Angie.

players.name: Ronnie
players.profile: The Street Sweeper seems more pre-occupied with keeping the streets clean rather then focusing on his golf - prefer others.

players.name: Marty
players.profile: Last years winner is back to do it all over again. He's fatter, angrier and more determined than ever - beware.

players.name: Buzza
players.profile: Somehow is always in the running. Laconic style, restless legs - could suprise.

players.name: Robbie
players.profile: For the amount of rounds this guy accumulates in a year, would assume a good showing -likely to dissapoint again.

players.name: Seko
players.profile: Last years runner up is hungry again. If he can manage to keep his mind on the job instead of thinking about pulling his cock, he could be a show - but very fucking doubtful.
